cropDisease.title: Crop Disease Detection
cropDisease.description: Upload an image of your crop leaves to detect diseases using AI-powered image analysis.
cropDisease.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select
cropDisease.noDiseaseDesc: Your crop appears to be healthy! Continue monitoring for best results.
cropDisease.uploadImagePlaceholder: Upload an image to detect crop diseases
cropDisease.leafRustSymptoms: Small reddish-brown pustules on leaves, yellowing of infected areas
cropDisease.leafRustTreatment: Apply fungicide containing propiconazole. Remove and destroy infected leaves. Ensure proper spacing for air circulation.
cropDisease.leafRustPrevention: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead irrigation, maintain proper spacing between plants.
cropDisease.blightSymptoms: Dark water-soaked spots on leaves, rapid wilting, brown lesions
cropDisease.blightTreatment: Apply copper-based fungicides. Remove affected parts immediately. Avoid overhead watering.
cropDisease.blightPrevention: Use disease-free seeds, practice crop rotation, ensure good drainage.
cropDisease.mildewSymptoms: White powdery spots on leaves and stems, leaf curling
cropDisease.mildewTreatment: Apply sulfur-based fungicides or neem oil. Improve air circulation around plants.
cropDisease.mildewPrevention: Avoid overcrowding, water plants at base, ensure adequate sunlight.
cropDisease.spotSymptoms: Circular brown or black spots with yellow halos on leaves
cropDisease.spotTreatment: Remove infected leaves. Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
cropDisease.spotPrevention: Water early in the day, avoid wetting foliage, maintain clean garden beds.
